ygData.subject: Re: Warriors vs Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that s a fair assessment. I stand corrected. I think I have trouble mainly because my armor sucks rotten eggs. But that s for another mailing list
ygData.messageBody:
I think that's a fair assessment. I stand corrected. I think I have
trouble mainly because my armor sucks rotten eggs. But that's for
another mailing list <g>

--- "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...> wrote:
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> Doc,
>
> I agree with you on all but your last scentence.
> Clerics are seriously
> underestimated. Belive me when i tell you that my
> friend who is a level 37
> cleric can solo a sand giant and i cannot with my
> level 37 warrior. Plain
> and simple. And to say they dont have firepower well
> thats not true either.
>
> Take MY cleric for example. Level 16, ac of 390, hp
> at 360, attack is 302.
> Not bad...not bad at all. I can tank for some time
> without worrying about
> dying at all. (Not to mention healing spells AND
> divine aura, an
> invulnerability spell) Ok so now there i go tanking
> away doing around 17
> damage with my FS morning star. Not bad. Then i
> start to cast without
> getting interrupted which is not hard to do at all.
> I can cast my Smite in
> between rounds. And it does 78 damage. Boom there
> you have it, each other
> round i am doing 100 damage. where as a level 16
> warrior would do about 60
> at most. But thats not his role, all im saying is
> that i think clerics are
> the best solo class in the game.
>
> just my 2 cents
>
